function.description: removes a document from the database or removes a version from a document. Valid values for the version are "all" or a number. if the version is "all" the whole document will be removed. otherwise the version in that document will be removed. Valid values for the section are "source" and "target". Throws an exception if the given id or version does not exist, or if the section is invalid.

example.title: Usage
example.header: removing a specific version from a document.
